title: Can't Login.
body: Whatever I do I cant login into lol. I have tried changing my password using the reset 10 times, nothing works. My account name is angelstunner. [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/2zhjfj7.png[/IMG] . Trust me I am typing the password right... Forum log in doesn't work either. But this account works on the client and forums.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I assume you have resolved this issue? as the account in question (angelstunner) just played a game of ranked flex 8 hours ago, if this was not you and the issue is yet to be resolved it sounds like your account may be compromised, I would recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.
